channel.title: Lostechies on Learn, Converse, Share
channel.description: Recent content in Lostechies on Learn, Converse, Share

item.title: And we're off
item.description: LosTechies.com is up and running.  This is the central posting grounds for a good number of Agile .NET developers.  We’re hoping to grow and help contribute to the software development community.
